get.description: Check if server is running normal
List all MetaKEGG analysis methods available. The name will be used to start a anylsises pipeline run in endpoint `/pipeline/{pipeline_ticket_id}/run/...`

schema.title: Response List Available Analysis Methods Api Analysis Get

post.summary: Initialize A Metakegg Pipeline Run Definition
post.description: Define a new meta Kegg pipeline run. The pipeline-run will not start immediatily but be queued. The response of this endpoint will be a ticket that can be used to track the status of your pipeline run.

parameters.name: sheet_name_paths

schema.description: Sheet name containing the pathway information (see docs). Has to apply to all input files in case of multiple.

patch.summary: Update A Metakegg Pipeline Run Definition
patch.description: Update the pipeline params of an allready existing pipeline run definition. The pipeline must not be started via `/pipeline/{pipeline_ticket_id}/run/{analysis_method_name}` allready.

post.summary: Attach File To Meta Kegg Pipeline Run Definition
post.description: Add a file to an non started/queued pipeline-run definition
Qeueu the pipeline-run. If the queue is passed the pipeline will change from 'queued' into 'running' state.

get.description: Check the status of a triggered pipeline run.
Download the result of a succeded pipeline run.

410.description: Pipeline-run expired and result is cleaned.

424.description: Pipeline-run failed. Check endpoint '/pipeline/{pipeline_ticket_id}/status' for details

get.description: Get some infos and config for the client
Get some infos and config for the client

schema.title: Response Get Links Info Links Get

contact_email.title: Contact Email
contact_email.description: Email that clients can present for contact.

bug_report_email.title: Bug Report Email
bug_report_email.description: Email address that is used for bug reports. Will be the same as `contact_email` if not explicit configured in the backend otherwise.

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms And Conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: Terms and Conditions presented to the user.

pipeline_ticket_expire_time_sec.title: Pipeline Ticket Expire Time Sec
pipeline_ticket_expire_time_sec.description: Time how long a Pipeline ticket is valid. This is only for informational purposes as the backend is handling ticket expiring.

state.title: State
state.description: When a new pipeline run is started it will be `queued` first. After there is slot free in the background worker it start `running`. based on the failure or success of this run the state will be `failed` or `success`. The result of a pipeline run will be cleaned/deleted after 1440 minutes and not be available anymore. After that the state will be `expired`

place_in_queue.title: Place In Queue
place_in_queue.description: Shows how many pipeline runs are ahead of a queued pipeline-run

error.title: Error
error.description: If the state of a pipeline run is `failed`, the error message will be logged into this attribute

error_traceback.title: Error Traceback
error_traceback.description: If the state of a pipeline run is `failed`, the error traceback will be logged into this attribute

output_log.title: Output Log
output_log.description: Output prints of a MetaKegg Pipeline analysis run.

result_path.title: Result Path
result_path.description: If the state of a pipeline run is `success`, the result can be downloaded from this path.

sheet_name_paths.title: Sheet Name Paths
sheet_name_paths.description: Sheet name containing the pathway information (see docs). Has to apply to all input files in case of multiple.

sheet_name_genes.title: Sheet Name Genes
sheet_name_genes.description: Sheet name for gene information (see docs). Has to apply to all input files in case of multiple.

genes_column.title: Genes Column
genes_column.description: Column name for gene symbols in the sheet_name_genes

log2fc_column.title: Log2Fc Column
log2fc_column.description: Column name for log2fc values in the sheet_name_genes

count_threshold.title: Count Threshold
count_threshold.description: Minimum number of genes per pathway, for pathway to be drawn. Default value : 2

pathway_pvalue.title: Pathway Pvalue
pathway_pvalue.description: Raw p-value threshold for the pathways

input_label.title: Input Label
input_label.description: Input label or list of labels for multiple inputs

folder_extension.title: Folder Extension
folder_extension.description: Folder extension to be appended to the default naming scheme. If None and default folder exists, will overwrite folder

methylation_path.title: Methylation Path
methylation_path.description: Path to methylation data (Excel , CSV or TSV format)

methylation_genes.title: Methylation Genes
methylation_genes.description: Column name for methylation gene symbols

methylation_pvalue_thresh.title: Methylation Pvalue Thresh
methylation_pvalue_thresh.description: P-value threshold for the methylation values

methylation_probe_column.title: Methylation Probe Column
methylation_probe_column.description: Column name for the methylation probes.

probes_to_cgs.title: Probes To Cgs
probes_to_cgs.description: If True, will correct the probes to positions, delete duplicated positions and keep the first CG.

miRNA_path.title: Mirna Path
miRNA_path.description: Path to miRNA data (Excel , CSV or TSV format)

miRNA_genes.title: Mirna Genes
miRNA_genes.description: Column name for miRNA gene symbols

miRNA_pvalue_thresh.title: Mirna Pvalue Thresh
miRNA_pvalue_thresh.description: P-value threshold for the miRNA values

miRNA_ID_column.title: Mirna Id Column
miRNA_ID_column.description: Column name for the miRNA IDs.

benjamini_threshold.title: Benjamini Threshold
benjamini_threshold.description: Benjamini Hochberg p-value threshold for the pathway

save_to_eps.title: Save To Eps
save_to_eps.description: True/False statement to save the maps and colorscales or legends as seperate .eps files in addition to the .pdf exports

compounds_list.title: Compounds List
compounds_list.description: List of compound IDs to mapped in pathways if found.

detail.title: Detail
detail.default: Pipeline-run expired and result is cleaned.

detail.title: Detail
detail.default: Pipeline-run failed. Check endpoint '/pipeline/{pipeline_ticket_id}/status' for details
